name: The Seven Elemental Vases
storyline:
Michael Woods is a millionaire who has an obsession with relics and mythology. One day, an unidentified man contacted him to sell him a book of legends, Michael decided to buy it from him and came across a story about seven elemental vases. The seven vases each controlled the fundamental matter of the world; whoever had all seven of them in the same place would be able to create and destroy as they pleased.
Thus begins Michael's exploration to obtain the seven vases, at the same time, Mike Woodens will stop his father from his plan to prevent him from achieving that ambitious dream, along with the help of Samantha, the goddess of the sand.
summary: The kingdom of gods and humans have separated, you will be the protagonist of all its consequences. With a lot of levels, characters, creatures, history and more in a 2D Pixel art style.
